The wendigos claim our mining of the shards is going to deplete them forever. They also claim the Azurice Shrine can grow them indefinitely—if there's enough energy.

We've decided to believe them for now. We need crimson shards—they're the most potent—if we're going to imbue the shrine.

Head southeast and gather what you can.

It's possible these shards can restore the Azurice Shrine and keep the shards from disappearing entirely from our world.

There's a lesson to be learned about sustainability and balance.
Apologies, <PCNAME>. We need more crimson shards.
